level.text: The Office of the Commission Secretary shall submit notices of solicitation and awards of contracts, as well as modification and amendments, over $ 100,000 to the Office of Contracts and Procurements for publication in the District of Columbia Procurement Digest.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 42 DCR 5126 (September 8, 1995); as amended by emergency Rulemaking published at 45 DCR 6356 (September 4, 1998) [EXPIRED]; as amended by emergency Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 913 (February 11, 2000) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 2600 (April 14, 2000).
